name: S. O. Nic Adventure
description:
Help Świętosław Ožbej Nic save his shoes and spread peanut butter!

Featuring:

  • Spacebars
  • Genies
  • Nazi salesmen
  • Unicorn-branded peanut butter
  • Mouth-made sounds

Made from scratch in 72h for Ludum Dare 42 by:

  • Reuh: typing on keyboard, idea, making funny sounds, the boss fight at the end
  • Ihampf: more typing on keyboard, more sounds, not doing a maze, but doing UI
  • Trocentraisin: level design, music, arguing with the rest of the group for hours
  • Céleste Granger: amazing graphics drawn on a tablet with not enough battery
